reviews.review: the best end i have seen before
amazing game just beat it again today and will always recommend this classic puzzler

portal 2 is pretty solid, though i still would rather play the first. this one is great with much more charm, but the puzzles can oftentimes be a lot more annoying and challenging late-game, and late-game as a whole kind of sucks besides the very last few chambers. you just want to get to the end already, and it feels chapter 7 and 8 are both filler. tldr; too long, but if you chug through that, it ends up being a pleasant experience

this game has been my favorite ever since it came out on the ps3. the characters are excellent, the puzzles are challenging, and the game itself is beautiful. i would recommend this game to everyone. this has been my first time playing it on pc, but my 5th time playing overall, if you can afford it, buy it.

Always wanted to play. really fun, you don't need to play the first one to understand the story, but you should. good story, graphics, music and gameplay
Very good, great puzzles, great story, great jokes, great game
If you like puzzles you'll like this game
Instant classic of a game. The voice acting work by Stephen Merchant makes it so enjoyable.

Bought this game a while back, and it's still one my favorite game of all time. Still holds up to games released today imo. Even though the campaign is only a few hours long, most of my playtime in this game has come from me replaying it over and over again. I love everything about this game, from the witty humor, to the level design, and the amazing music. I would recommend this to anyone who hasn't played a valve game before, the game is easy to pick up for new players, and you are free to play at your own pace. All in all, if you want a great game with a great story, this is it, even if the engine and graphics are a bit dated.

Stupendous. I cannot describe how good this game is (it says I've only played this for 4.9 hours, but this is my first playthrough on PC. I have beat the game 4 other times on Xbox 360). Buy this game. What are you waiting for. Great dialouge, atmosphere, and story. Hell, even the graphics still hold up by today's standards. And it's only 10 bucks! Just buy it already!

La verdad es que este juego se merece estar casi al mismo nivel que el Half Life 2, debido a que la historia es increible, los graficos son demasiado buenos y la optimizacion del source sigue presente. Le da un cierre a la historia de portal de una manera magnifica y el multijugador es muy divertido. Un juego que disfrute mucho y que he rejugado varias veces, totalmente recomendado.

An amazing puzzle game and a great sequel to the original. It has great singleplayer and multiplayer campaigns, with some mindboggling puzzles, and a great story as a cherry on top. Even though I only spent 4 hours completing the singleplayer campaign, and 7 hours completing the multiplayer campaign, with spoilers nontheless, I still very much enjoyed this title, and would award it the #1 portal experiment puzzle game of all time.
